name: Steel Hardness Calculator
author: Joshua Morley - Digital Marketing

sections.description:
Steel Hardness Calculator

This table shows approximate hardness of steel using Brinell, Rockwell B and C and Vickers scales.
These conversion charts are provided for guidance only as each scales uses different methods of measuring hardness.
The right hand column show an approximate equivalent tensile strength.
See calculator in action here http://stainlessandaluminium.co.uk/steel-hardness-calculator/
sections.installation:
1. Download and upload the zip file to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Use the shortcode [SteelCalc] to show the calculator
sections.faq:
How do I display the steel calculator

Use the shortcode [SteelCalc] to display the steel calculator

Can I change the style of the calculator

Yes the plugin us classes that you can select to alter the apperance

Can you modify x for me

For custom development contact:
http://www.marketingthechange.com/
http://joshmorley.info/
https://codeable.io/developers/josh-morley/
